org.dgfoundation.amp.newreports

Class FilterRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.newreports.FilterRule

  • public class FilterRule
extends java.lang.Object
    Filter rule that can be of one of FilterRule.FilterType type

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FilterRule.FilterType
      Possible types of rules: a range filter (of values/ids), a single value filter (value/id), a list filter (of values/ids)
      Options:
      FilterRule.FilterType.RANGE
      FilterRule.FilterType.SINGLE_VALUE
      FilterRule.FilterType.VALUES

    • Constructor Detail

      • FilterRule

        public FilterRule(java.lang.String min,
                  java.lang.String max,
                  boolean minInclusive,
                  boolean maxInclusive)
        Range filter rule to apply over some data, e.g. >= 2000 or between 2010 and 2014
        Parameters:
        min - - minimum value of the range, or null if no minimum limit
        max - - maximum value of the range, or null if no maximum limit
        minInclusive - - if true and 'min' is specified, then 'min' is an inclusive limit of the range
        maxInclusive - - if true and 'max' is specified, then 'max' is an inclusive limit of the range
        isIdRange - - whether (min,max) is a range of ids or a range of values

      • FilterRule

        public FilterRule(java.lang.String min,
                  java.lang.String max,
                  boolean minInclusive,
                  boolean maxInclusive,
                  boolean positive)

      • FilterRule

        public FilterRule(java.lang.String min,
                  java.lang.String max,
                  java.lang.String minName,

                  boolean minInclusive,
                  boolean maxInclusive)

      • FilterRule

        public FilterRule(java.util.List<java.lang.String> values,
                  boolean valuesInclusive)
        List filter rule, e.g. allowed years [2009, 2013, 2016]
        Parameters:
        values - - list of values or ids to filter by
        valuesInclusive - - true if only these values are allowed, false if these values are not allowed
        isIdList - - true if this is a list of ids, false if this is a list of values

      • FilterRule

        public FilterRule(java.util.List<java.lang.String> names,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> values,
                  boolean valuesInclusive)
        List filter rule, e.g. allowed years [2009, 2013, 2016]
        Parameters:
        filterName - - Name of the field/column/dimension that the ids correspond to
        values - - list of values or ids to filter by
        names - - list of names corresponding to ids to filter by
        valuesInclusive - - true if only this values are allowed, flase if this values are not allowed
        isIdList - - true if this is a list of ids, false if this is a list of values

      • FilterRule

        public FilterRule(java.lang.String value,
                  boolean valueToInclude)
        Single value filter
        Parameters:
        value - - value or id to filter by
        valueToInclude - - true if this value must be kept, false if it must be excluded
        isId - - true if this is an Id, false if this is a value

      • FilterRule

        public FilterRule(java.lang.String value,

                  boolean valueToInclude)
